text: John Henry Matthew Reilly (November 11, 1936 â€“ January 9, 2021) was an American actor. He appeared on soap operas including General Hospital, Sunset Beach, and Passions. Reilly was born in Chicago. His career lasted from 1965 until 2013. Reilly died on January 9, 2021 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Chicago
